Method Detail

takeImage

public void takeImage(java.awt.Image img,
                      java.awt.image.ImageObserver obs)
Reads an image (.gif) from harddisk and creates a corresponig sprite.
At the color of the most upper,left pixel is used as backcolor. Should be replaced by the one specified by the gif format, but I couldn't yet find out how to read it.

takeImage_nonTransparent

public void takeImage_nonTransparent(java.awt.Image img,
                                     java.awt.image.ImageObserver obs)
Reads an image (.gif) from harddisk and creates a corresponig sprite.
This image is nonTransparent and has a square outline
